propertiesMeta.name: permission
propertiesMeta.description: Name of the permission described by this rule.

propertiesMeta.name: inset
propertiesMeta.description: Inset shadows are drawn inside the border (even transparent ones), above the background, but below content.

propertiesMeta.name: blur
propertiesMeta.description: The larger this value, the bigger the blur, so the shadow becomes bigger and lighter.

propertiesMeta.name: blurUnit
propertiesMeta.description: The larger this value, the bigger the blur, so the shadow becomes bigger and lighter.

propertiesMeta.name: spread
propertiesMeta.description: Positive values will cause the shadow to expand and grow bigger, negative values will cause the shadow to shrink.

propertiesMeta.name: spreadUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Positive values will cause the shadow to expand and grow bigger, negative values will cause the shadow to shrink.

ControlAccessRight.description: An access right which is checked by controls. In the Schema a defaultValue of true mean access is granted, false is denied, null is ask parent.

name.description: Name of the access definition in the HTML.

displayName.description: Name which should be presented the user.

visible.description: Determine if an access definition is shown to the user.

description.description: A long description of this access definition.

defaultValueInternal.description: Defines the default of this control access right. This will be used if the check for this access right does not return a result. true mean access is granted, false is denied, null is ask parent.

objectType.description: An enum defining the variable type.
An enum defining the variable type.
An enum defining the variable type.
An enum defining the variable type.

color.description: Defining a color as CSS color: #-hexadecimal, rgb(), rgba(), hsl(), hsla(), css color keyword, none or transparent.
Defining a color as CSS color: #-hexadecimal, rgb(), rgba(), hsl(), hsla(), lowercase css color keyword or transparent.

expressions.description: An array of {Expression} objects which will be evaluated to determine if the 'True' or 'False' action path is used.

true.description: An array of {Action} objects which will be processed if the overall expression result is 'true'.

false.description: An array of {Action} objects which will be processed if the overall expression result is 'false'.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

showFalseActions.description: Holds the current state of the Trigger GUI. Not used in runtime

showTrueActions.description: Holds the current state of the Trigger GUI. Not used in runtime

description.description: A long description of this control.

anyOf.title: Comment
anyOf.description: Free comment. Will be ignored on runtime.

preventDefault.description:
If activated the default action of the event will not be triggered.
If set on touch events the corresponding mouse events will not be triggered.

displayName.description: Name which should be presented the user.

virtualControlRight.description: Name of the virtual control right.

propertiesMeta.description: Special string for each physical key on the keyboard (does not have to be the same as the corresponding char)

propertiesMeta.name: pointDotFillColor
propertiesMeta.description: Color for the fill of the dots

propertiesMeta.name: pointDotStrokeColor
propertiesMeta.description: Color for the stroke of the dots

propertiesMeta.name: yAxisId
propertiesMeta.description: Id of the y-axis to use for this graph

propertiesMeta.name: pointDotInStopMode

propertiesMeta.name: width
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%), a grow factor (1) or 'auto' (equivalent to grow factor 1).
The grow factor determines how much the items will grow relative to the rest of the items when positive free space is distributed.

propertiesMeta.name: widthUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the number defines a pixel value (px), percent value (42%) or grow factor (2).

propertiesMeta.name: widthMode
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the width is taken from the width value or calculated from child controls in this Column.

propertiesMeta.name: maxWidth
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines maximal width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-width overrides width, but min-width overrides max-width.

propertiesMeta.name: minWidth
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines minimal width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-width overrides width, but min-width overrides max-width.

propertiesMeta.name: overflow
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if a control should be fully visible if it is outside of this column.

propertiesMeta.name: height
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines height of the cells of this row in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%), a grow factor (1) or 'auto' (equivalent to grow factor 1).
The grow factor determines how much the items will grow relative to the rest of the items when positive free space is distributed.

propertiesMeta.name: heightUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the number defines a pixel value (px), percent value (42%) or grow factor (2).

propertiesMeta.name: heightMode
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the height is taken from the height value or calculated from child controls in row.

propertiesMeta.name: maxHeight
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines maximal height of the row in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-height overrides height, but min-height overrides max-height.

propertiesMeta.name: minHeight
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines minimal height of the row in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-height overrides height, but min-height overrides max-height.

propertiesMeta.name: overflow
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if a control should be fully visible if it is outside of this row.

MeasurementUnitOrFactor.description:
Defines if the number defines a pixel value (px), percent value (42%) or grow factor (2).
The grow factor determines how much the items will grow relative to the rest of the items when positive free space is distributed.

CellOptions.title: CellOptions
CellOptions.description: Definition of cell options in the grid.

propertiesMeta.name: columnIndex
propertiesMeta.description: Column index of the defined cell.

propertiesMeta.name: rowIndex
propertiesMeta.description: Row index of the defined cell.

propertiesMeta.name: backgroundColor
propertiesMeta.description: Definition of the background color which is used if no or a transparent Background image is set.

propertiesMeta.name: backgroundImageWidthUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Width Unit of the background image.

propertiesMeta.name: backgroundImageHeightUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Height Unit of the background image.

propertiesMeta.name: backgroundImageHorizontalAlignment
propertiesMeta.description: Horizontal Aligment of the background image.

propertiesMeta.name: backgroundImageVerticalAlignment
propertiesMeta.description: Vertical Aligment of the background image.
